phases.name: Phase 0 — Cast Foundations & Inspirations
phases.summary: Ground Hyperion's cast work structure in TechnoCore's resilient queue story and Farcaster's issue-to-cast communication.

tasks.summary: Harvest TechnoCore queue, WAL, and Doctor diagnostics to frame the cast work guardrails.
tasks.description: Review technocore/README.md plus the Rust queue/agent crates to understand per-worker leases, WAL telemetry, RATATUI/Doctor diagnostics, and session persistence before encoding them as cast checks.

tasks.summary: Decode Farcaster's cast workflow and merge queue guardrails.
tasks.description: Read farcaster/README.md and the workflows under .github/workflows to catalog how issues become casts, how Jules intervenes, and how CI/merge queues stay synchronous.

phases.name: Phase 1 — Cast Protocol Design
phases.summary: Define the deterministic JSON schema and messaging steps that make each cast auditable before it enters the queue.

tasks.summary: Compose the cast payload schema and handshake narrative.
tasks.description: Draft a JSON schema that captures cast headers (task_id, agent_id, payload_version, ttl, checksum), metadata (origin, approvals, telemetry anchors), and the handshake that ties submissions to WAL audit entries.

tasks.summary: Document the deterministic messaging stages for cast lifecycle events.
tasks.description: Outline the stage transitions (submitted -> cast -> guard-suite -> apply -> archive) and WAL entries so operators can replay each message from submission through approval and delivery.

phases.name: Phase 2 — Queue & Messaging Integration
phases.summary: Bring the cast protocol alive inside Hyperion's queue, WAL, and telemetry surfaces so every message is observable and deterministic.

tasks.summary: Apply the cast schema to Hyperion's change_queue writer and WAL logging.
tasks.description: Update the queue writer to enforce the cast schema, log the JSON payload, approvals, guard commands, and emit telemetry entries that mention the originating cast message.

tasks.summary: Surface cast telemetry inside the CLI/TUI guard panels.
tasks.description: Plan RATATUI panes that display queue depth, cast latency, WAL progress, guard command results, and human approval comments so operators never lose sight of the messaging health.

phases.name: Phase 3 — Governance, Testing & Delivery
phases.summary: Document the cast work structure, add deterministic guard tests, and highlight unresolved decisions so Hyperion operators trust the protocol.

tasks.summary: Capture the cast messaging story inside Hyperion docs and references.
tasks.description: Update README.md, HYPERION.md, and references/QUESTIONS.md to describe the cast work structure, guard expectations, telemetry knobs, and where human judgment is still required.

tasks.summary: Define verifiable tests and guard scripts that keep casts deterministic.
tasks.description: Plan JSON fixtures, WAL audits, and CI guard checks that fetch cast logs, replay their states, and confirm audit fields before each merge slot is advanced.
